title: Aster Top & Dress
desc: The Aster pattern features a square cut front and back neckline, as well as squared off armholes. It has angled French darts and a button-back opening. View A is a crop top hitting around the natural waistline, while View B is a mini shift dress hitting a few inches above the knee. View B also has soft back darts for extra shaping and inseam pockets. All views include a self-facing and an optional full lining.
fabric_recommendations: Light to medium weight woven fabrics such as cotton
Lightweight woven fabrics such as cotton lawn

title: Aster Top & Dress
desc: The Aster pattern features a square cut front and back neckline, as well as squared off armholes. It has angled French darts and a button-back opening. View A is a crop top hitting around the natural waistline, while View B is a mini shift dress hitting a few inches above the knee. View B also has soft back darts for extra shaping and inseam pockets. All views include a self-facing and an optional full lining.
notions: 1/4 yd medium weight fusible interfacing for View A
1 yd medium weight fusible interfacing for View B
fabric_recommendations: Light to medium weight woven fabrics such as cotton
Lightweight woven fabrics such as cotton lawn, cotton voile, lightweight linen, and rayon for lining

title: Blair Skirt
desc: The Blair pattern is a woven skirt that is fitted through the waist and hips and has a straight fit to the hem. It has a button-front opening and belt loops. There are three length options: mini, midi, and maxi. All views have optional pockets with inverted pleats, and a belt.

title: Blair Skirt
desc: The Blair pattern is a woven skirt that is fitted through the waist and hips and has a straight fit to the hem. It has a button-front opening and belt loops. There are three length options: mini, midi, and maxi. All views have optional pockets with inverted pleats, and a belt.
notions: 3/4” buttons - View A = 8 (6 if skipping pockets), View B = 11 (9 if skipping pockets), View C = 14 (12 if skipping pockets)
fabric_recommendations: Main Fabric: Medium weight woven fabrics such as denim, corduroy, linen, and wool.
Lining Fabric: Light weight woven fabrics such as cotton lawn, linen, and quilting cotton.

title: Brynn Cardigan
desc: The Brynn pattern is a fitted cardigan with a V-neck and front button opening. View A is sleeveless, View B has a short sleeve, and View C has long sleeves. All views can be sewn in three lengths - cropped, hip length, and dress length. The dress view includes a center back seam for extra shaping.
fabric_recommendations: Light to medium weight stretch fabrics

title: Brynn Cardigan
desc: The Brynn pattern is a fitted cardigan with a V-neck and front button opening. View A is sleeveless, View B has a short sleeve, and View C has long sleeves. All views can be sewn in three lengths - cropped, hip length, and a dress length. The dress option includes a center back seam for extra shaping.
fabric_recommendations: Light to medium weight stretch fabrics

title: Calvin Wrap Dress / Top
desc: The Calvin pattern is a wrap dress and top with exposed bias binding that extends into long ties to form a bow closure. It has rings and sliders which create adjustable shoulder straps for an easy fit. View A is a short top that hits approximately two inches below the natural waist. View B is a straight dress that hits at mid calf.

title: Dani Short & Pant
desc: The Dani pattern is an elastic waist short or pant with inseam and rear pockets, a small paperbag waist, and a cuff. Views A and C are shorts with an approximate 3 inch inseam. Views B and D are pants that hit at the ankle with an approximate 27.5 inch inseam. Views A and B have a zip fly and two buttons at the waist, while Views C and D have a full elastic waistband for an easy pull on fit.
fabric_recommendations: Light to medium weight woven fabrics

title: Dani Short & Pant
desc: The Dani pattern is an elastic waist short or pant with inseam and rear pockets, a small paperbag waist, and a cuff. Views A and C are shorts with an approximate 3 inch inseam. Views B and D are pants that hit at the ankle with an approximate 27.5 inch inseam. Views A and B have a zip fly and two buttons at the waist, while Views C and D have a full elastic waistband for an easy pull on fit.

title: Darla Dress & Jumpsuit
desc: The Darla pattern is a dress or jumpsuit with four views. All Views have a self-lined fitted bodice with spaghetti straps, a gathered waistline, and inseam pockets. Views A and B are dresses while Views C and D are jumpsuits. You can choose between a classic bodice back with an invisible zipper (Views A and C), or a tie back closure (Views B and D). All views can be made in either a mini or maxi length.

title: Darla Dress & Jumpsuit
desc: The Darla pattern is a dress or jumpsuit with four views. All Views have a self-lined fitted bodice with spaghetti straps, a gathered waistline, and inseam pockets. Views A and B are dresses while Views C and D are jumpsuits. You can choose between a classic bodice back with an invisible zipper (Views A and C), or a tie back closure (Views B and D). All views can be made in either a mini or maxi length.
notions: 18" invisible zipper (for Views A and C)
invisible zipper foot (for Views A and C)
1 yd of 3/8" elastic (for Views B and D)

title: Emerson Pant / Short
desc: The Emerson pattern is a pull-on crop pant or short with an elasticized back and flat front waistband. Views A and B have a mid rise that sits just below the natural waist. Views C and D have a high rise that sits over the belly button. All views have front pleats and side pockets. Views A and C are a cropped, wide leg pant, hitting a couple of inches above the ankle. Views B and D are a short with an approximate 4 inch inseam.

title: Emerson Pant / Short
desc: The Emerson pattern is a pull-on crop pant or short with an elasticized back and flat front waistband. Views A and B have a mid rise that sits just below the natural waist. Views C and D have a high rise that sits over the belly button. All views have front pleats and side pockets. Views A and C are a cropped, wide leg pant, hitting a couple of inches above the ankle. Views B and D are a short with an approximate 4 inch inseam.

title: Hudson Pant
desc: The Hudson pattern is an updated take on the classic sweatpant. It has front pockets, an elastic mid rise waistband, drawstring, and cuffs. The modern fit of these pants leaves a bit of extra room around the hips and then tapers into a skinny leg. View A is a full length pant and View B is midcalf.

title: Hudson Pant
desc: The Hudson pant is the piece of clothing that you will wear all of the time. It is comfortable enough to wear around the house, but can easily be dressed up to go run errands. The modern fit of these pants leaves a bit of extra room around the hips and then tapers into a skinny leg. View A is a full length pant and View B is midcalf.
notions: 2 x 1 inch scrap of fusible interfacing
fabric_recommendations: Medium weight knits such as cotton lycra, french terry, ponte, and sweatshirt knit with a suggested stretch of 25% or more.

title: Jesse Tee
desc: Sign up for our newsletter to get a code to download the Jesse pattern for free! The Jesse pattern is a relaxed fit T-shirt with two lengths. View A is cropped length, ending around the natural waistline and View B is a full length T-shirt ending below the hip. The oversized fit of this design includes a dropped shoulder, wide crew neckline, and sleeves hitting just above the elbow.
fabric_recommendations: knit fabrics with 10% or more crosswise stretch
knit fabrics with 50% or more stretch

title: Jesse Tee
desc: Sign up for our newsletter to get a code to download the Jesse pattern for free! The Jesse pattern is a relaxed fit T-shirt with two lengths. View A is cropped length, ending around the natural waistline and View B is a full length T-shirt ending below the hip. The oversized fit of this design includes a dropped shoulder, wide crew neckline, and sleeves hitting just above the elbow.

main: knit fabrics with 10% or more crosswise stretch
neckline: knit fabrics with 50% or more stretch

title: Lander Pant & Short
desc: The Lander pattern is a pant and short with a high waist and button fly. The design includes front and back patch pockets, belt loops, and a straight fit through the legs. View A is a short with a 4” inseam, View B is an ankle length pant, and View C is a boot length pant that can be worn with a heel.
notions: 4 jeans buttons or regular buttons (5/8” wide)
fabric_recommendations: Medium to heavy bottomweight fabrics with little to no stretch
1/2 yd of light to medium weight woven fabric for the front pocket linings

title: Lander Pant & Short
desc: The Lander pattern is a pant and short with a high waist and button fly. The design includes front and back patch pockets, belt loops, and a straight fit through the legs. View A is a short with a 4” inseam, View B is an ankle length pant, and View C is a boot length pant that can be worn with a heel.
fabric_recommendations: Medium to heavy bottom weight fabrics with little to no stretch
1/2 yd of light to medium weight woven fabric for pocket linings

title: Lander Zipper Expansion Pack
desc: The Lander Zipper Expansion Pack turns your button fly Lander into a zip fly short or pant. It includes new fly and waistband pattern pieces, a fly extension, and the instructions needed to create this new version. Note that this is an extension and therefore you must purchase the original Lander pattern to use it.

lining_fabric: light to medium weight woven fabric

title: Lodo Dress
desc: The Lodo pattern is an elevated take on a basic t-shirt dress. It has a straight fit through the waist and hips and a slightly tapered hem to create a subtle cocoon shape. It has a V neck at center front and an extended cap sleeve. Both the neckline and armholes are finished with a woven facing for stability and structure. View A has a hem that hits at mid calf with a slit at center back for moveability. View B’s hem hits a couple of inches above the knee.

title: Lodo Dress
desc: The Lodo pattern is an elevated take on a basic t-shirt dress. It has a straight fit through the waist and hips and a slightly tapered hem to create a subtle cocoon shape. It has a V neck at center front and an extended cap sleeve. Both the neckline and armholes are finished with a woven facing for stability and structure. View A has a hem that hits at mid calf with a slit at center back for moveability. View B’s hem hits a couple of inches above the knee.
fabric_recommendations: medium weight stable knit fabric with 25% stretch

title: Lora Dress
desc: The Lora pattern is an empire waist dress with four views. All views have underbust gathers, a self-lined bodice, and twelve loop buttons along the center front. Views A and C have half-inch spaghetti straps at the shoulders while Views B and D have long puff sleeves. The dress is fitted through the waist and hips and has a straight fit through the skirt with Views A and B ending just above the knee and Views C and D hemmed a couple inches above the ankle.
fabric_recommendations: Light to medium weight woven fabric such as linen, cotton, or rayon.

title: Lora Dress
desc: The Lora pattern is an empire waist dress with four views. All views have underbust gathers, a self-lined bodice, and twelve loop buttons along the center front. Views A and C have half-inch spaghetti straps at the shoulders while Views B and D have long puff sleeves. The dress is fitted through the waist and hips and has a straight fit through the skirt with Views A and B ending just above the knee and Views C and D hemmed a couple inches above the ankle.
notions: lightweight fusible interfacing (1.5 yds for Views A & B, 2 yds for Views C & D)
2 yds 3/8" elastic for Views B & D only
fabric_recommendations: Light to medium weight woven fabric such as linen, cotton, or rayon.

title: Marlo Sweater
desc: The Marlo pattern is an oversized sweater with a dropped shoulder, deep V-neck, wide bands and large buttons. View A is cropped length. View B has patch pockets and hits above midthigh.
notions: 1/2 yd fusible interfacing for View A

title: Marlo Sweater
desc: The Marlo pattern is an oversized sweater with a dropped shoulder, deep V-neck, wide bands and large buttons. View A is cropped length. View B has patch pockets and hits above midthigh.

title: Mave Skirt
desc: The Mave pattern is an elastic waist skirt with a drawstring, inseam pockets and an optional lining. The skirt can be made with or without ruffles in different lengths to create numerous options.
notions: 1” x 3” scrap of lightweight fusible interfacing

title: Mave Skirt
desc: The Mave pattern is an elastic waist skirt with a drawstring, inseam pockets and an optional lining. The skirt can be made with or without ruffles in different lengths to create numerous options.
notions: 1” x 3” scrap of lightweight fusible interfacing

title: Men's Hudson Pant
desc: The Men’s Hudson pant is a modern take on the sweatpant that is comfortable enough to wear around the house, but can easily be dressed up for around town. The fit of these pants leaves a bit of extra room around the hips, has a slightly dropped crotch, and then tapers into a skinnier leg. It has an elastic waist with a drawstring, front pockets, and a cuff at the ankle.
notions: 2 x 1 inch scrap of fusible interfacing

title: Mini Emerson Crop Pant / Short
desc: The Mini Emerson pattern is a pull on pant or short with an elasticized back and flat front waistband that sits just below the natural waist. Both views have front pleats and side pockets. View A is a cropped, wide leg pant, hitting around mid calf. View B is a pair of easy to wear shorts with an approximate 2 inch inseam.

title: Mini Hudson Pant
desc: The Mini Hudson Pant is a children’s sized skinny sweat pant with an elastic waistband, drawstring, pockets, and cuffs. The modern fit of these pants leaves a bit of extra room around the hips and then tapers into a skinny leg. View A is a full length pant and View B is midcalf.

title: Mini Nova Jumpsuit
desc: The Mini Nova pattern is a knit jumpsuit with four views. All views have a fully faced neckline and armholes. Views A and B have a wide elastic waistband and inseam pockets. Views C and D have a straight fit through the waist and attached front pockets. Views A and C are a short romper length while Views B and D are long with an elastic casing at the ankle.
fabric_recommendations: Light to medium weight knit fabrics

title: Mini Ogden Cami
desc: The Mini Ogden cami is a simplified version of the adult Ogden cami pattern. It has a soft V neck at center front and spaghetti straps over each shoulder. The front neckline and armholes are finished with a partial lining and the back is finished with an elastic casing for easy dressing.

title: Mini Rio Ringer T-Shirt & Dress
desc: The Mini Rio pattern is a ringer style T-shirt and casual dress. View A is a semi-fitted top that hits around the hip. View B is a semi-fitted dress ending just above the knee. Both views have contrasting ribbing around the crew neckline and short sleeves for a slightly vintage look.

main_fabrics: light to medium weight knit fabrics with 40% or more stretch
binding_fabrics: light to medium weight knit fabrics with 75% or more stretch

title: Mini Southport Dress
desc: The Mini Southport Dress is a simplified, children's version of the Southport Dress. It is designed with a button opening at center front, and a combination elastic and drawstring waist. The neck and armhole openings are finished with bias tape and the skirt hits a bit above the knee.

title: Nikko Top & Dress
desc: The Nikko pattern includes four views, all with a simple and stylish mock turtleneck. Views A and B are tops with a fitted silhouette that is perfect to pair with a high waisted bottom like the Lander pattern. Views C and D are straighter through the waist and hip, extending to the ankle, with knee-length side slits to complete the dress. Views A and C are both sleeveless, cut to resemble a racerback, but with enough coverage to wear a regular bra. Views B and D have long fitted sleeves that reach the wrist.

title: Nikko Top & Dress
desc: The Nikko pattern includes four views, all with a simple and stylish mock turtleneck. Views A and B are tops with a fitted silhouette. Views C and D are straighter through the waist and hip, extending to the ankle, with knee-length side slits to complete the dress. Views A and C are both sleeveless, cut to resemble a racerback, but with more coverage to wear a regular bra. Views B and D have long fitted sleeves that reach the wrist.

title: Nova Jumpsuit
desc: The Nova pattern is a knit jumpsuit with four views. All views have a fully faced neckline and armholes. Views A and B have a wide elastic waistband and inseam pockets. Views C and D have a straight fit through the waist and attached front pockets. Views A and C are a short romper length while Views B and D are long with an elastic casing at the ankle.

title: Nova Jumpsuit
desc: The Nova pattern is a knit jumpsuit with four views. All views have a fully faced neckline and armholes. Views A and B have a wide elastic waistband and inseam pockets. Views C and D have a straight fit through the waist and attached front pockets. Views A and C are a short romper length while Views B and D are long with an elastic casing at the ankle.
notions: 1/4 yd of tricot or knit interfacing
fabric_recommendations: Light to medium weight knit fabrics

title: Ogden Cami
desc: The Ogden Cami is a simple blouse that can either be worn on its own or as a layering piece under blazers and cardigans. It has a soft V neck at both center front and center back necklines, and delicate spaghetti straps. The neckline and armholes are finished with a partial lining for a beautiful, high end finish.

title: Ogden Cami
desc: The Ogden Cami is a simple blouse that can either be worn on its own or as a layering piece under blazers and cardigans. It has a soft V neck at both center front and center back necklines, and 3/4” wide straps. The neckline and armholes are finished with a partial lining for a beautiful, high end finish.

title: Riley Overalls
desc: The Riley pattern is a classic overall design with a relaxed fit and two lengths. View A is a shorts length with an approximate 6 inch inseam (4 inch rolled). View B is full length with a straight fit through the leg and an approximate 28 inch inseam (26 inch rolled). All views have a front bib with patch pockets, rear patch pockets, belt loops and a faux fly.

title: Riley Overalls
desc: The Riley pattern is a classic overall design with a relaxed fit and two lengths. View A is a shorts length with an approximate 6 inch inseam (4 inch rolled). View B is full length with a straight fit through the leg and an approximate 28 inch inseam (26 inch rolled). All views have a front bib with patch pockets, rear patch pockets, belt loops and a faux fly.

title: Rio Ringer T-Shirt & Dress
desc: The Rio pattern is a ringer style T-shirt and casual dress. View A is a fitted top that hits around the hip. View B is a semi-fitted dress ending just above the knee. Both views have contrasting ribbing around the crew neckline and short sleeves for a slightly vintage look.

main_fabrics: Light to medium weight knit fabrics with 40% or more stretch
binding_fabrics: Light to medium weight knit fabrics with 75% or more stretch

title: Rio Ringer T-Shirt & Dress
desc: The Rio pattern is a ringer style T-shirt and casual dress. View A is a fitted top that hits around the hip. View B is a semi-fitted dress ending just above the knee. Both views have contrasting ribbing around the crew neckline and short sleeves for a slightly vintage look.

main_fabrics: light to medium weight knit fabrics
binding_fabrics: light to medium weight knit fabrics

title: Rory Jumpsuit
desc: The Rory sewing pattern is a jumpsuit with 4 views. All views have angled patch pockets set into princess seams, a V-neckline and a front button closure. Views A and C are sleeveless options while Views B and D have an extended sleeve and sleeve band. Views A and B are short length jumpsuits with an approximate three inch inseam, while Views C and D have a tapered pant that hits just above the ankle. You can choose to add the optional D-ring ties into any of the views to accentuate the waistline.
notions: 2 yds of 1/2" single fold bias tape

title: Roscoe Blouse & Dress
desc: The Roscoe Blouse and Dress is an oversized garment with a gathered neckline and raglan sleeves. The front is finished with a center slit and neckties. The sleeves are designed to hit a few inches above the wrist. View A is a blouse, view B is a mini dress or tunic and view C hits mid-calf. Views B and C have a large ruffle at the bottom.

title: Roscoe Blouse & Dress
desc: The Roscoe Blouse and Dress is an oversized garment with a gathered neckline and raglan sleeves. The front is finished with a center slit and neckties. The sleeves are designed to hit a few inches above the wrist. View A is a blouse, view B is a mini dress and view C hits mid-calf. Views B and C have a large ruffle at the bottom.

title: Salida Skirt
desc: The Salida pattern is a skirt with two views. Each has a soft V-shaped yoke at the front and back, a high waist, and a front zipper fly. View A is a fitted, paneled skirt that hits at the top of the knee, and features a back slit for easy walking. View B is mid-calf length, with a paneled skirt that flares out at the bottom.

title: Salida Skirt
desc: The Salida pattern is a skirt with two views. Each has a soft V-shaped yoke at the front and back, a high waist, and a front zipper fly. View A is a fitted, paneled skirt that hits at the top of the knee, and features a back slit for easy walking. View B is mid-calf length, with a paneled skirt that flares out at the bottom.
notions: 2 yd of fusible interfacing (matching the weight of your fabric)
one sew-on 5/8” hook and eye closure
fabric_recommendations: Medium weight woven fabrics such as denim, twill, corduroy, linen and chambray
Light weight woven fabric such as rayon bemberg, cotton voile, or other standard lining fabrics

title: Shelby Dress & Romper
desc: The Shelby pattern is a princess-seamed dress or romper with four views. Each has a V-shaped neckline, front button opening, and back waist tie. Views A and B are dresses with a traditional short sleeve. View A is a mini dress hitting mid-thigh, while View B is a longer dress that ends around the ankle. Views C and D are rompers with a cap sleeve. The romper gives the illusion of being a dress with the coverage of a short or pant. View C is a mini length romper hitting mid-thigh, while View D’s hem ends just above the ankle.

title: Shelby Dress & Romper
desc: The Shelby pattern is a princess-seamed dress or romper with four views. Each has a V-shaped neckline, front button opening, and back waist tie. Views A and B are dresses with a traditional short sleeve. View A is a mini dress hitting mid-thigh, while View B is a longer dress that ends around the ankle. Views C and D are rompers with a cap sleeve. The romper gives the illusion of being a dress with the coverage of a short or pant. View C is a mini length romper hitting mid-thigh, while View D’s hem ends just above the ankle.

title: Southport Dress
desc: The Southport pattern is a tank style dress designed to be worn as a coverup at the beach or a dress for around town. It has a button opening at center front and a drawstring waist with inseam pockets. View A hits 20” from the waist. View B is maxi length and hits 42” from the waist and includes a center front slit.

title: Zoey Neckline Expansion
desc: This free download gives you three additional neckline options for the Zoey Tank & Dress sewing pattern. The three options include a high neckline, scoop neckline, and soft square neckline. The neckline expansion is for the front neckline of all views of the Zoey (cropped tank, hip tank and dress). The back neckline remains the same as the original Zoey pattern. It includes the expansion files for both the 0-18 and 14-32 size range. Simply download and use the files for the size range you need. Note that this is an add-on and therefore you must purchase the original Zoey pattern to use it. If you still need to purchase the Zoey pattern you can do so in two size ranges: 0-18 or 14-32.

title: Zoey Tank & Dress
desc: The Zoey pattern is a fitted knit tank top and dress. All views have a soft front V and low scooped back neckline. Armholes and necklines are finished with 5/8” wide bands. Views A and B are tank tops where View A has a cropped length hitting around the natural waist and View B ends around the hipline. View C is a fit and flare tank dress with a center front and back seam for extra shaping and the hem ending a few inches above the ankle.

title: Zoey Tank & Dress
desc: The Zoey pattern is a fitted knit tank top and dress. All views have a soft front V and low scooped back neckline. Armholes and necklines are finished with 5/8” wide bands. Views A and B are tank tops where View A has a cropped length hitting around the natural waist and View B ends around the hipline. View C is a fit and flare tank dress with a center front and back seam for extra shaping and the hem ending a few inches above the ankle.
